title: I'm at a loss to explain...
body:
I'm currently in a game. Blitz hooks my ADC lane partner Ezreal. Then the game goes into drug mode, where i move towards the enemy tower. Then the game freezes. 

Now, my internet is perfectly fine, everything works, including the LOL CHAT client. However I cannot return to the game.

So, I try to restart my computer and modem. When I come back  I still cannot connect to the game. So then I try op.gg to see if i can spectate the game which has been going now for 47 mins. On the loading screen it gets to 100% for every champion then stops.

Whats happening? The game is still going btw...

Anyone know?

replies.body: Oh no... Looks like Ghost games are back. This god damn bug happens twice a year at least, lets hope it's just your game. Last time we couldn't play for 3 -4 hours
Hey mate, you were Volibear in one of my other games :)

> [{quoted}](name=BaylorYe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gF9lktYP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-05T01:18:37.576+0000)
>
> Hey mate, you were Volibear in one of my other games :)

Ok must be a server error, i'm off to do other things. I hope I don't get leaverbusted, because I've tried everything to reconnect for the past hour. Have fun.
Same as me, this is bullshit cant even leave the game!

Still can't connect to the game, and it's been going for more than an hour:

http://i.imgur.com/8GNlgpi.jpg

The game is still going

http://i.imgur.com/LmiKi7a.jpg
